name: 80th Anniversary No.2
additionalNotes:
Altadis' release of the 80th Anniversary in box pressed torpedo, Ecuadorian Sumatra capa, Dominican Olor 2010 banda, Pepe Mendez Dominican Pilotico tripa, Nicaraguan Criollo 1998 tripa, Nicaraguan Corojo 1999 tripa.

Packaged in both 12 count oak boxes and eighty count oak humidors. Only fifty humidors were prouduced
